p: In the essential oil of geranium leaves, thirty-nine compounds were identified, which accounted for 67.98 ± 5.15% of the total oil. The main components of the essential oil were citronellol (26.7%) and geraniol (10.1%). The other main ingredients were α–pinene, cis–linalool oxide, cis–rose oxide, trans–rose oxide, menthone, isomenthone, α–copaene, β–bourbonene, and citronellyl propanoate; all those have been reported previously for geranium leaves’ EO [ 19].
